plugins\/blea\/plugin_info\/configuratio.Autoriser la mise à jour des fichiers de: Automatically update antenna files during an update
plugins\/blea\/plugin_info\/configuratio.Très pratique, mais attention si vos ant: Very practical, but be careful if your antennas have problems at the time of the shift, then there may be an infinite toothed wheel and in all cases the wheel will remain the time of shift of the antennas
plugins\/blea\/plugin_info\/configuratio.Intervalle de scan présence. Il est déco: Presence scan interval. It is not recommended to go below 20 seconds
plugins\/blea\/plugin_info\/configuratio.Nombre de scan invisible pour déclencher: Number of invisible scans to trigger absence
plugins\/blea\/plugin_info\/configuratio.Combien de fois le device ne doit pas et: How many times the device should not be seen during a scan to decide that it is absent (strongly advised not to go below 3 or 4 to avoid false positives
plugins\/blea\/plugin_info\/configuratio.Par défaut le scan est passif, pour cert: By default the scan is passive, for some ticatag type devices when it must be active to detect button presses, but can remain passive for the presence of the passive being very economical for batteries and sufficient
plugins\/blea\/plugin_info\/configuratio.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir mettre tous les: Are you sure you want to put all the equipment on Local by:
plugins\/blea\/plugin_info\/configuratio.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir télécharger les: Are you sure you want to download the latest module configurations? This will relaunch the Blea plugin

plugins\/blea\/desktop\/modal\/blea.divo.L\\'id de l\\'équipement ne peut etre vi: The equipment id cannot be empty:

plugins\/blea\/desktop\/modal\/blea.dott.L\\'id de l\\'équipement ne peut etre vi: The equipment id cannot be empty:

plugins\/blea\/desktop\/modal\/blea.divo.L\\'id de l\\'équipement ne peut etre vi: The equipment id cannot be empty:

plugins\/blea\/desktop\/modal\/blea.remo.Mettre tous les équipements sur cette an: Put all the equipment on this antenna
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/modal\/blea.remo.La durée d'installation des dépendances: Installation time of dependencies on an antenna can take up to almost 30 minutes depending on the antenna. If you are using antennas REMEMBER to authorize the API of the plugin on something other than LOCALHOST
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/modal\/blea.remo.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir mettre tous les: Are you sure you want to put all the equipment on this antenna by:
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/modal\/blea.remo.Etês-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer cette: Are you sure you want to delete this antenna?

plugins\/blea\/desktop\/modal\/blea.grap.Représentation relative de la puissance: Relative representation of the power of the links on the antennas. You can move the antennas and save their position to find them in the same place. Concerning the equipments, these take a position of equilibrium (you can also move them but they will balance). If the antennas are all on one side of the equipment, there may be several balance positions on either side. However, in the case of equipment with antennas around it (as triangular as possible), there will be only one equilibrium position which will be close to the real one. Some modules like the NIU emit that during the press, so after a moment there is no more signal, at that time the modules are virtually connected to the local antenna via dotted lines

plugins\/blea\/desktop\/modal\/blea.divo.L\\'id de l\\'équipement ne peut etre vi: The equipment id cannot be empty:

plugins\/blea\/desktop\/php\/blea.php.Vous êtes en mode scan. Recliquez sur le: You are in scan mode. Click again on the scan button to exit this mode (otherwise the mode will remain active for one minute)
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/php\/blea.php.Antenne qui prendra les infos, attention: Antenna that will take the info, be careful not to put on button type devices to avoid repeating the info (unless this is what you want). However presence and rssi will be systematically taken into account by all the antennas
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/php\/blea.php.Utile pour savoir quelle antenne contrôl: Useful for knowing which antenna will control the equipment. Choosing All will have the consequence of potentially triggering the action as many times as there are antennas
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/php\/blea.php.Demandera les infos en forcé. A éviter a: Will forcely request info. Avoid absolutely unless necessary and if the device allows
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/php\/blea.php.Inutile de mettre des valeurs trop faibl: No need to set values too low, if the values are identical to the previous ones, there will be no update and this may cause a blocking of the scan
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/php\/blea.php.Essaiera de garder la connexion avec l'a: Will try to keep the connection with the device (for devices that are slow to connect). Please note that once a connection is open, some devices are no longer visible. If All is selected, this option will not be used. Absolutely avoid this option on devices running on battery
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/php\/blea.php.Nombre de scans où le device est invisib: Number of scans where the device is invisible to declare it not present on the antenna (device specific, otherwise the global value of the plugin is used

plugins\/blea\/desktop\/js\/blea.js.Quel type de produit voulez-vous inclure: What type of product do you want to include:
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/js\/blea.js.Choisissez le type de produit que vous s: Choose the type of product you want to add
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/js\/blea.js.Attention, \"En supprimant et recréant\": Please note, "By deleting and recreating" will delete existing commands
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/js\/blea.js.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir récréer toutes: Are you sure you want to recreate all the commands? This will delete existing orders
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/js\/blea.js.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer tous: Are you sure you want to delete all the unknown devices? This will delete only Unknown devices that are not assigned to an object
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/js\/blea.js.Vous êtes en mode scan. Recliquez sur le: You are in scan mode. Click again on the scan button to exit this mode (otherwise the mode will remain active for one minute)
plugins\/blea\/desktop\/js\/blea.js.Un périphérique vient d\\'être inclu\/ex: A device has just been included / excluded. Please refresh the page

plugins\/blea\/core\/config\/devices\/di.Impossible de téléverser le fichier (lim: Unable to upload file (web server limit?)

plugins\/blea\/core\/config\/devices\/do.Le champs message doit être un numérique: The message field must be a numeric:

plugins\/blea\/core\/class\/blea.class.p.Information manquante pour ajouter l\\'é: Missing information to add equipment. Impossible to include
plugins\/blea\/core\/class\/blea.class.p.Vérifier le démon sur votre antenne: Check the daemon on your antenna
plugins\/blea\/core\/class\/blea.class.p.Impossible de lancer le démon blea, véri: Unable to launch the blea daemon, check the log
